channel.title: Allowing people to acces my server
channel.description: Ok, I have the No-IP DUC program and now im not sure how to allow people to access my server. I think i need to open a port but I'm not sure which one to open. Can someone please help!

item.title: Allowing people to acces my server
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

If you don’t want to have to go though that crap jsut go to www.hamachi.cc and download hamachi and make a new network on there and run your server and all the people have to do it join your pass and use the ip on there to join your server.EASY!

Read full topic
item.source: Allowing people to acces my server

item.title: Allowing people to acces my server
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

ok well this is what you do
you went to no-ip and made a name such as Yourscape.servegame.com or Yourscape.no-ip.info right?

after you do that run no -ip go into your source file and click compile then wait for it to compile then exit out and go to runserver and run your server then post it in advertisement

Read full topic
